# CorrelatedVectorsInstances

# File naming

All files are named as follows:

[Number of random Variables]Vars_[Number of observations]_[Number of discrete variables]_[Number of continuous variables] _[ Number of replication].txt

# File Structure
All files contain:

```python
K:5	# The number of variables
N:500	# The number of observations
Gap:0.670378088025882	# The initial deviation from the target matrix given by IC 
Rho:	# The target matrix
1 0.8 0.45 0.2 -0.3
0.8 1 0.45 0.5 -0.1
0.45 0.45 1 0.1 -0.3
0.2 0.5 0.1 1 -0.5
-0.3 -0.1 -0.3 -0.5 1
X:	# The observations, separated by commas.
6.02272042688565,0.170044640777633,0.883491600165144,5.93656395068183,18.0282201568088
2.58694162242851,0.0204031901666895,0.799165911739692,5.14129215085685,19.8918946612512
```
